english_example_sentence: Let the diligent student put his new book on the clean table.
russian_example_sentence: Пусть прилежный студент положит свою новую книгу на чистый стол.
turkish_example_sentence: Çalışkan öğrenci yeni kitabını temiz masaya koysun.
